00020 #include <string>
00021 
00022 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/serialization/level.hpp>
00024 
00025 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(std::string, boost::serialization::primitive_type)
00026 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00027 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(std::wstring, boost::serialization::primitive_type)
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 // left over from a previous incarnation - strings are now always primitive types
00031 #if 0 
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <boost/serialization/collections_save_imp.hpp>
00034 #include <boost/serialization/collections_load_imp.hpp>
00035 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00036 
00037 namespace boost { 
00038 namespace serialization {
00039 
00040 // basic_string - general case
00041 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00042 inline void save(
00043     Archive & ar,
00044     const std::basic_string<U, Allocator> &t,
00045     const unsigned int file_version
00046 ){
00047     boost::serialization::stl::save_collection<
00048         Archive, std::basic_string<U, Allocator> 
00049     >(ar, t);
00050 }
00051 
00052 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00053 inline void load(
00054     Archive & ar,
00055     std::basic_string<U, Allocator> &t,
00056     const unsigned int file_version
00057 ){
00058     boost::serialization::stl::load_collection<
00059         Archive,
00060         std::basic_string<U, Allocator>,
00061         boost::serialization::stl::archive_input_seq<
00062             Archive, 
00063             std::basic_string<U, Allocator> 
00064         >,
00065         boost::serialization::stl::reserve_imp<
00066             std::basic_string<U, Allocator> 
00067         >
00068     >(ar, t);
00069 }
00070 
00071 // split non-intrusive serialization function member into separate
00072 // non intrusive save/load member functions
00073 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00074 inline void serialize(
00075     Archive & ar,
00076     std::basic_string<U, Allocator> & t,
00077     const unsigned int file_version
00078 ){
00079     boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, file_version);
00080 }
00081 
00082 } // serialization
00083 } // namespace boost
00084 
00085 #include <boost/serialization/collection_traits.hpp>
00086 
00087 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS(std::vector)
00088 
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_STRING_HPP
